title: Group portrait of Elks members, from left, seated: Elenora Boykins; standing: James Humbert, Edward Miles, Colonel Flewellan, Eley Randolph, Alice Holley Rose, being awarded with chain collar; Samuel Gray, Marion Charles, and Glen Jordon; seated: Hester R. Thomas, gathered at banquet table Six men and two women, members of the Greater Pittsburgh Elks, standing behind banquet table in the Greater Pittsburgh Lodge, 639 Lincoln Avenue, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
